info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 9:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Todd County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1044 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Littleburg, or 14 miles north of Valentine, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Todd County, including the following locations... southeastern Rosebud Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central South Dakota. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central South Dakota.
